summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Filipino Community Center; removing a budget proviso restricting expenditure of an appropriation in the 2007 Budget, and authorizing the expenditure of the funds for purchase and acceptance of an easement with restrictive covenants from Filipino Community of Seattle to provide for City and public access uses and the provision of social services on the property at 5740 M.L. King Jr. Way South, Seattle, Washington.
